title: The Quantum Singularity Core
prompt: A futuristic quantum singularity core floating in a vast, dark cosmic void, emitting swirling light patterns in deep blue and gold, symbolizing the convergence of human intelligence and artificial superintelligence. The core pulses with energy, surrounded by translucent data streams forming fractal patterns. Cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed, 8K resolution, realistic textures, volumetric lighting, inspired by 'Blade Runner 2049' and 'Interstellar'.

The screens flicker with neural patterns as AI processes decisions. Futuristic control room with human operators observing. Cool blue and white lighting, high-tech interface, cinematic, 8K

title: Human-AI Collaboration

One person touches a glowing neural network model, symbolizing trust and partnership. Warm, hopeful lighting, detailed facial expressions, cinematic, 8K
